review_text: Finally...ice cube trays with covers that really work! These are great...there's nothing like fresh, clean, great tasting ice! I...like many other reviewers do not use the pop top to fill these, I find it's easier to fill these the old fashioned way. They do work very well and a little water on the bottom pops them right out! A great product!
product_name: Tupperware Fresh & Pure Ice Tray Purple Set of 2
